lead_paragraph: Genocide Charge for Serb The war crimes tribunal charged Yugoslavia's ex-president, Slobodan Milosevic, with genocide, the first such indictment issued against a former head of state. PAGE A8 Russia's Role in NATO Russia is studying an expanded role in NATO, especially to fight terror, but the alliance made it clear that President Putin was not seeking full membership or veto power. PAGE A9
